analysis.description:
Poker.freeLottery (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#241-282) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winNo == 7

Poker.freeLottery (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#241-282) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winNo == 7
Poker.play (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#153-241) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _jpNo == 77 && jpBalance > jpMinPrize

Reentrancy in Poker.constructor (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#132-153):
	External calls:
	- _rndSeed = rnd.getRandom() (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#148-151)
	- rnd.destruct() (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#151)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rndSeed (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#151-153)

Reentrancy in Poker.updateRndSeed (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#292-302):
	External calls:
	- _rndSeed = rnd.getRandom() (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#295-296)
	- rnd.destruct() (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#296)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rndSeed (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#297-302)

Poker.play (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#153-241) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _gType == 4 && _bet.contain(_winNo) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#205-218)
	- _gType == 3 && _bet.contain((_winNo - 1) / 4 + 1) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#195-203)
	- _gType == 2 && _bet.contain(_winNo % 4 + 1) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#185-193)
	- (_winNo >= 29 && _bet.contain(2)) || (_winNo <= 24 && _bet.contain(1)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#170-182)
	- _winNo >= 25 && _winNo <= 28 && _bet.contain(0) (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#176-182)
	- _jpNo == 77 && jpBalance > jpMinPrize (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#225-233)

Poker.freeLottery (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#241-282) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- winNo == 7 (/unique_chucks/4/0x6b026adb88f36c9e7ffafa7206aaadc6255e34f0.sol#260-271)
